description:
PamFax is an easy to use solution to send faxes worldwide at low rates. PamFax allows you to send files from your Touchpad and provides a free fax number for you to receive faxes.

Why PamFax?

* Send and receive faxes easily worldwide
* 3 FREE pages after sign up
* FREE fax number*
* Obligation-free: No monthly cost & no ads
* No credit card required to sign up
* Supports Dropbox, Box.net and Google Docs
* Pay-as-you-go or subscription options

*) Where available, trial

With PamFax for webOS you can easily send any document as a fax. Just install PamFax, sign up and send your first fax with your Touchpad. Send a locally stored document, a photo or a document from your Dropbox, Box.net or Google Documents account.

Free to sign up, competitive pricing, worldwide and obligation free!
versionNote:

Change: Made menu buttons bigger.
